hero.subtitle: Un répertoire international de fan-traductions pour les jeux Nintendo.

about.title: Qu'est-ce que Ninternational ?
about.subtitle:
You are a fan-translator working on a Nintendo game? Ninternational is a fan-translation repository all about Nintendo games from all platforms. You can submit your translation on our website, to get more visibility and help from a dedicated community.
If you're interested, join our Discord!

footer.disclaimer: Ninternational is a fan-driven translation group for Nintendo games. It is not affiliated with Nintendo or any of its subsidiary.
